00042 #ifndef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ASM__
00043 #error Assembler file supported only by IAR EWAVR for AVR
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 
00047 //_____ I N C L U D E S ______________________________________________________
00048 
00049 #define  ENABLE_BIT_DEFINITIONS
00050 #include <ioavr.h>
00051  
00052 
00053 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ______________________________________________
00054 
00055    PUBLIC   flash_read_sig
00056    PUBLIC   flash_read_fuse
00057    
00058 
00061 
00062    RSEG     CODE
00063 
00070 flash_read_sig:
00071    RCALL    WAIT_SPMEN                       // Wait for SPMEN flag cleared
00072    MOV      R31,R17                         
00073    MOV      R30,R16                          // move adress to z pointer (R31=ZH R30=ZL)
00074    LDI      R20, ((1<<SPMEN) | (1<<SIGRD))  
00075    OUT      SPMCSR, R20                      // argument 2 decides function (r18)
00076    LPM                                       // Store program memory
00077    MOV      R16, R0                          // Store return value
00078    RJMP     WAIT_SPMEN                       // Wait for SPMEN flag cleared
00079 
00080 
00087 flash_read_fuse:
00088    RCALL    WAIT_SPMEN                       // Wait for SPMEN flag cleared
00089    MOV      R31,R17                         
00090    MOV      R30,R16                          // move adress to z pointer (R31=ZH R30=ZL)
00091    LDI      R20,((1<<SPMEN) | (1<<BLBSET))  
00092    OUT      SPMCSR, R20                      // argument 2 decides function (r18)
00093    LPM                                       // Store program memory
00094    MOV      R16, R0                          // Store return value
00095    RJMP     WAIT_SPMEN                       // Wait for SPMEN flag cleared
00096 
00097 
00100 WAIT_SPMEN:
00101    MOV      R0, R18
00102    IN       R18,SPMCSR                       // get SPMCR into r18
00103    SBRC     R18,SPMEN
00104    RJMP     WAIT_SPMEN                       // Wait for SPMEN flag cleared
00105    MOV      R18, R0
00106    RET
00107 
00108 
00109    END
